de.aicard.learnset

    Fields in de.aicard.learnset with type parameters of type CardStatus 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> LearnSetAbo.cardStatus
    The member-variable m_cardStatus is an ArrayList of CardStatus.
    private java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> LearningSession.cardStatusList
    The List of Cards the Account is learning in this session, combined with the Account-specific information of the Cards, saved in an ArrayList of CardStatus.
